text:
@realDonaldTrump We can’t wait!!! 
We are in desperate need of strong, capable leadership to unite our country! 
Your divisive, hateful rhetoric has created mistrust and tribalism. Your mixed messaging on Covid-19 has caused confusion and chaos. 
Our country deserves better!!
